analyzed: bum pa thal chen nyungs kar smra ru ma 'dod na brab pa'i rdzas g.yas su gzhag go/_/lcags kyu gnyis byis pa rnams kyang khrus byas la dkyil 'khor lha la phyag gzugs brnyan sbyangs pa la sogs

analyzed: par bya/_/zhes pa bsgrub stan rmad du 'byung ba'i mchod pa la sogs pa dang /_k+sha

analyzed: dris pa'i lha mchod pa'i lha mchod pa bzhi pa'i rdzas bshams te skabs la bab par mchod

analyzed: pa'o/_/de nas phyi nang nye bsnyen bstan mtshhams bcad te rtags gsum gdab thal pa

analyzed: rag ta zhag pa'ang bya/_las kyi dkyil 'khor gzhung rung khro bor brtshams te rdzogs

analyzed: na 'di rgyud na med do om badzra kro ta ta ki ra tsha hu~m che ge mo dza dza hum pra be sha ya dza hum bam ho

analyzed: a dang ci la sogs pa'i/_/lam lnga'i sems can gang yang rung /_/zhes pa/

analyzed: dza hum bam ho ste/_/zhes pa/_dgug thabs phyag rgya bzhis dgug pa'o/_/bzlas
translated: are the summoning with the four mudras.🔽In terms of the samādhi of recitation,🔽all of those mantras are connected.

analyzed: pa'i dbang du na sngags de kun sbrel ba bshad zin to/_/de'i tshhe ting nge 'dzin

translated: If they speak directly, it is good. If not, ask, “What god or demon are you?”

analyzed: ces pa bzhi'o dbang bskur ba bstan pa'i phyir/_dbab pa'i las kyi rim pa rdzogs

analyzed: brlabs pa bgegs bsad pa'o/_/de'ang 'bu ta lo tsha ne swa ha/_zhes pa lnga

translated: The purification with the five meats and five elixirs🔽The purification with the five meats and five nectars🔽The purification with the five nectars and five amṛtas🔽The purification with the five nectars and five elixirs

original: so'i sngags kyis sbyang zhing ban d+ha lag du thogs te tshhig 'di dag re re nas brjod
analyzed: so'i sngags kyis sbyang zhing ban d+ha lag du thogs te tshhig 'di dag re re nas brjod
translated: Purify with the mantra of the teeth, hold the skull in the hand, and recite these dhāraṇīs one by one.

original: de de srog dang ldan par bya'o/_/bdag nyid kyi rig pa snang ba'i/_byang chub
analyzed: de de srog dang ldan par bya'o/_/bdag nyid kyi rig pa snang ba'i/_byang chub
translated: That is the way to empower the life.

original: kyi sems zhe sdang dag pa rdo rje rigs su bskyed pa des thugs rje bdag rtogs 'dul bar mdzad/
analyzed: kyi sems zhe sdang dag pa rdo rje rigs su bskyed pa des thugs rje bdag rtogs 'dul bar mdzad/
translated: The bodhicitta of the pure hatred of the appearance of one’s vidyā is generated in the vajra family.

original: zhe sdang tshhul gyis zhe sdang nga dang bdag med gnyis dbye sbyor zhing 'joms pas ril byams
analyzed: zhe sdang tshhul gyis zhe sdang nga dang bdag med gnyis dbye sbyor zhing 'joms pas ril byams
translated: That tamer of the self-appearance of compassion is the conqueror of the two, hatred and the self.🔽Since the two, hatred and love, are united and destroyed by the various kinds of hatred, the view of the nonduality of hatred and love is applied to the protection wheel.🔽Since the family is abandoned, there is the mind of love.

original: sdang gnyis med pa la rigs zer srung lta ba sbyar ba ni rigs spangs pas byams pa'i thugs dang ldan pa'o byams pa chen po'i thugs so/_/om bdag nyid gti mug chos sku ste bzhi zhes
analyzed: sdang gnyis med pa la rigs zer srung lta ba sbyar ba ni rigs spangs pas byams pa'i thugs dang ldan pa'o byams pa chen po'i thugs so/_/om bdag nyid gti mug chos sku ste bzhi zhes
translated: The mind of great love is the four, and so on, such as “the great feces.”

original: pa la sogs pa/_dri chen a+o~m las de bzhin rigs su bskyed pa rmongs pa'i nad rnams
analyzed: pa la sogs pa/_dri chen a+o~m las de bzhin rigs su bskyed pa rmongs pa'i nad rnams
translated: The great feces are generated from oṃ into the tathāgata family.🔽That tamer of the various illnesses of delusion is the remover of ignorance because delusion is pure by nature.

original: sel bar byed des gti mug ngo bo dag pa'i phyir ma rig sel te rang byung ba'i ye shes 'od
analyzed: sel bar byed des gti mug ngo bo dag pa'i phyir ma rig sel te rang byung ba'i ye shes 'od
translated: The light of self-originated gnosis is the remover of ignorance.

analyzed: zer gsal ba'i sa ye shes sgrib byed dang thams cad 'byung ba'i 'khor lo yi bral ba ni sku'i rigs
translated: The wheel of the origin of all, free from the obscurations of the pristine consciousness of the clear ray, is the family of the body.🔽Since the seed of the self-originated nature is the quality of pride,

original: kyi phyir ril rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba'o/_/tram bdag nyid nga rgyal yon tan te/🔽rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud dpal gsang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i spyan 'grel pa'o//

original: bzhis zhes pa la sogs pa/_mang sa tram gi sa bon las rang rig yon tan rigs
analyzed: bzhis zhes pa la sogs pa/_mang sa tram gi sa bon las rang rig yon tan rigs
translated: The qualities of the family of the pristine consciousness of the vidya of the body are the qualities of the family of the tongue.🔽The qualities of the family of the pristine consciousness of the vidya of the mental faculty are the qualities of the family of the body.

original: nga rgyal dag par bskyed sbyang na/_yon tan ni snying rje chen pos snying rjes 'gro don 'phel🔽bar byed don rgya chen por 'grub pa dang /_nyan thos zhi ba'i blo chen dbyings su sbyor rang
analyzed: nga rgyal dag par bskyed sbyang na/_yon tan ni snying rje chen pos snying rjes 'gro don 'phel bar byed don rgya chen por 'grub pa dang /_nyan thos zhi ba'i blo chen dbyings su sbyor rang
translated: The qualities of the family of the pristine consciousness of the vidya of the gnosis are the qualities of the family of the mental faculty.🔽The qualities of the family of the pristine consciousness of the vidya of the eyes are the qualities of the family of the gnosis.🔽The qualities of the family of the pristine consciousness of the vidya of the ears are the qualities of the family of the eyes.🔽The qualities of the family of the pristine consciousness of the vidya of the nose are the qualities of the family of the ears.🔽The qualities of the family of the pristine consciousness of the vidya of the tongue are the qualities of the family of the nose.

original: rgyal theg pa chen po la skul ba dang /_blo mchog dag ni yon tan rgya mtshho dpag med pa'i sa
analyzed: rgyal theg pa chen po la skul ba dang /_blo mchog dag ni yon tan rgya mtshho dpag med pa'i sa
translated: The qualities of the family of the pristine consciousness of the vidya of the body are the qualities of the family of the tongue.🔽The qualities of the family of the pristine consciousness of the vidya of the mental faculty are the qualities of the family of the body.🔽The qualities of the family of the pristine consciousness of the vidya of the gnosis are the qualities of the family of the mental faculty.

original: la 'god pa la sogs pa tshhad dang bral ba'o/_/hri bdag nyid bzhis 'dod chags
analyzed: la 'god pa la sogs pa tshhad dang bral ba'o/_/hri bdag nyid bzhis 'dod chags

analyzed: gsung mchog ste zhes pa dag rag ta gsum pad ma rigs su bskyed pa ste/_yon tan
translated: The supreme speech is the three rakta generated in the lotus family.🔽The nature of the qualities is completely pure of the afflictions.

original: dang ngo bo nyon mongs pa las rnam par dag nyon mongs dug lnga rnam par dag_/chags med sems kyi de bzhin no
analyzed: dang ngo bo nyon mongs pa las rnam par dag nyon mongs dug lnga rnam par dag_/chags med sems kyi de bzhin no

analyzed: 'dod chags ma spangs bral ba'o/_/a bdag nyid las kyi sems dpa' ste bzhis

analyzed: don rnams ma lus grub par byed/_log rtog ma lus 'dul ba'i mchog don gnyis rdzogs par byed

analyzed: yon tan ni le lo gnyis dang g.yeng ba drug spong ste ngo bo nyid la gnyis pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/thugs rje myur ba las byung ba'o de med pa'i thugs rje ni gang du 'ang thogs

analyzed: pa med pa la rgyal ba kun tu thog med pa zin chags med pa'i gzhir gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/
translated: The compassion that arises from the swiftness of the mind is the compassion that is unimpeded anywhere because it is the basis of the nonattachment of all victors.

analyzed: bcum pa gzhan la snang spyi'i yon tan ni/_ye shes drug gis nyon mongs sbyangs gnyis zhes

translated: For the sake of both the five supreme substances and the substances for🔽the torma, one should liberate first.🔽Liberation is also for the sake of the stability of the substances for the

analyzed: lam lnga sbyong ba ye shes lnga/_'khor ba'i rtshad gcod shes rab mtshhon zhes pa/
translated: the five paths as the five gnoses, and the weapon of wisdom that severs🔽the continuum of samsara.

analyzed: lam lnga sbyor ye shes lnga go rims bsgyur te gang zhig bsgral bar bya ba'i snying gi pad ma'i
translated: The five gnoses are the reverse order of the five paths.

analyzed: 'dab bzhi lte ba dang bcas pa/_a su ni tri pri du zung re go rims bzhin
translated: The four petals and the center are the pairs of asuni, tri, pri and du, respectively.

original: gnas pa de gsal bar byas la/_de la rim pa dbus nas om mu/_a+o~m rgya/
analyzed: gnas pa de gsal bar byas la/_de la rim pa dbus nas om mu/_a+o~m rgya/
translated: Once they are visualized, the stages are as follows: Om mu in the center, om rgyas in the east,

original: swa mam/_hum lam/_ham tam/_bsams la/_de dag sgrib pa byang nas cho ga gsum gyi🔽rim pas sa bon dang lus ngag yid sbyangs te rigs lngar rim par gsal ba sbyor
analyzed: swa mam/_hum lam/_ham tam/_bsams la/_de dag sgrib pa byang nas cho ga gsum gyi rim pas sa bon dang lus ngag yid sbyangs te rigs lngar rim par gsal ba sbyor
translated: swa mam in the south, hum lam in the west, and ham tam in the north.🔽Once those are purified, the stages of the three rites purify the seed syllables, body, speech, and mind.

original: ba byas bas re mos dbus su thim ste/_dbus snang mdzad kyang ma dmigs par gyur te/🔽de ltar ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid rigs lngas sa bon lnga sbyangs nas/_ram yam kham

analyzed: gsum gyis bsregs gtor bkrus pas chos nyid du sbyangs pa ni/_sku gsum gyi

analyzed: mdzad pas dug gsum bsgral ba'o/_/zhes zer/_de bas na 'khor ba'i rtshad gcod
translated: It is said that the three poisons are liberated by the deeds of the three kāyas.

original: ces pa 'khor ba'i bag chags rtshad nas gcod pa shes rab kyi ral gri'o/_/hum du
analyzed: ces pa 'khor ba'i bag chags rtshad nas gcod pa shes rab kyi ral gri'o/_/hum du
translated: Therefore, “the measure of samsara is cut” means that the habitual tendencies of samsara are cut by the sword of wisdom.🔽Hum du

original: bsdu zhing ho yis g.yeng /_/ram gyis bsreg cing phat kyis 'phang /_/thabs
analyzed: bsdu zhing ho yis g.yeng /_/ram gyis bsreg cing phat kyis 'phang /_/thabs
translated: Gather, scatter with ho, burn with ram, and expel with phat.

original: dang shes rab 'brel pa'i/_/thig le dbyings su thim par bya/_/de nas gnyis🔽med du dbyings gyur nas/_/ye shes sems dpa'i sku ru bsgom drug zhes pa yi ge

translated: The bindu, which is the union of method and wisdom, dissolves into the dhātu.🔽Then, having become nondual with the dhātu, meditate on the form of the jñānasattva.

original: hu~m ram phat gsum gyis chos nyid du bsgral te shes pa sa bon drug bsregs hum drug du
analyzed: hu~m ram phat gsum gyis chos nyid du bsgral te shes pa sa bon drug bsregs hum drug du
translated: The six syllables—hum, ram, and phat—liberate into dharmatā. The six seed syllables of consciousness are burned. The six hums transform into a single hum.

original: gyur pa hum cig du drangs te shangs nas brgyud de yum gyi mkha' la phyin pa la cho
analyzed: gyur pa hum cig du drangs te shangs nas brgyud de yum gyi mkha' la phyin pa la cho
translated: That hum is drawn up through the nose and arrives in the space of the mother.🔽The method of the vajra is the union.🔽The appearance of the bindu is the net of the magical display of Vajrasattva.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud dpal gsang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i spyan 'grel pa'o//🔽ga'i sbyor bas sku tshhon gang bar gsal ba de zla rlung gis bteg ste phat kyis 'og

translated: The tantra is called the glorious Guhyagarbha.🔽The eye-opening commentary is the glorious Vajrasattva.🔽The method of the vajra is the union.🔽The appearance of the bindu is the net of the magical display of Vajrasattva.🔽The tantra is called the glorious Guhyagarbha.

original: min du 'phangs pa 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa ltar brtsham mo/_/drug pa ka bag tshir
analyzed: min du 'phangs pa 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa ltar brtsham mo/_/drug pa ka bag tshir

analyzed: bslab pa yi ge sar bsgral ba sman sbyang ba bstan pa'i phyir/_'bru gcig 'bru gsum 'bru

analyzed: lnga bsgom/_/bzhi bcu rtsha gnyis ma lus dang /_/zhes pa nas phyag rgya gsal bzhi

analyzed: pa zhes pa/_go rims bsgyur te/_khro bos kyang sbyang ba ni dam pa'i rigs

translated: Having generated the forty-two deities, one should train by visualizing🔽the wisdom deities, the three deities of the blessing, and the five deities of

analyzed: 'phro 'bar ba phyogs bcur spro slar 'dus bdud rtshi phyogs bcur 'bar sman nam bza' btung skabs
translated: When taking medicine or food and drink,🔽it is said that one should visualize the medicine or food as the medicine deity and then bless it.

analyzed: thog du hum du gsal ba la 'phro 'dus mtha' gnyis bral bar sbyang /_yang sna

analyzed: gsal ba'i 'phro 'dus bdud rtshir bya/_a+o~m gsal bas 'phros 'dus ye shes lnga

analyzed: dang ldan par gsal ba'ang yul med pas som nyi dang yid la byed pa bral ba'o/_/

translated: It is accomplished because the meaning is sealed by self-awareness.🔽The meaning of meditating on the self-appearance of vidya in that🔽place is self-clarity.
